mapper.select: SELECT currency FROM dutch_record WHERE trip_id = #{tripId} GROUP BY currency
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dutch_record (id, content, location, currency, payment, date, trip_id, reg_dt) VALUES (#{id}, #{content}, #{location}, #{currency}, #{payment}, #{date}, #{tripId}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE dutch_record SET content = #{content}, location = #{location}, currency = #{currency}, payment = #{payment}, date = #{date} WHERE id = #{id} AND trip_id = #{tripId}
